vlive.korean: 기뻐요. 저는 진짜로. I'm happy. Really. 듣기 View video VICTON : 숩이 등장..! 앨리스 섭섭했어요?!😔
역시 너무 기뻐요 먼 나라에서도... so I was really happy. Even at a faraway country,.. 듣기 View video NCT : 안녕 싱가폴💚
vlive.english: so I was really happy. Even at a faraway country,..

vlive.korean: "팬미팅 때문에 하루하루가 기뻐요" 맞아요, 저희가... "I am excited everyday about waiting for your fan meeting". Yes. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 쿠키쩨알의 '홈메이드 파이'만들기🥧
vlive.english: "I am excited everyday about waiting for your fan meeting". Yes.

vlive.korean: [상대편도 기쁘게 만드는 감격의 순간] - 우리가 기뻐, 적 팀인데 기뻐 - 민기야 좋아! [Everyone gets happy] - We're happy, even though we're on the other side. -REN, great! 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.11 뉴이스트의 우당탕탕 볼링 대결!
vlive.english: [Everyone gets happy] - We're happy, even though we're on the other side. -REN, great!

vlive.korean: 정말 축하드리고요 - 기뻐요! Congratulations! - I'm so happy. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#315. 얼음 땡! (w. 로켓펀치) / Freeze! (With Rocket Punch)
